meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Bhutan.
meanings.sent1: In Bhutan, you can buy many things with just one ngultrum.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for ngultrum at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The ngultrum rolled off the table and into the piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rare as a shiny ngultrum.
meanings.sent5: The ngultrum sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A coin or note representing one ngultrum.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny ngultrum in my pocket.
meanings.sent2: The ngultrum had a picture of the king on it.
meanings.sent3: The ngultrum in the vending machine got stuck, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a valuable ngultrum, treasured by all who heard them.
meanings.sent5: The ngultrum jingled in his hand, a sound of wealth and possibility.
